mapper.sql:
SELECT T.*,
FROM AUTHEN_ADMIN_SECRET_KEY T LEFT JOIN CM_ADMIN_INFO V ON T.ADMIN_ID=V.ADMIN_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHEN_ADMIN_SECRET_KEY SET UPDATED_DT = , UPDATED_BY = #{mdps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_SID = #{mdss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{dataDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PASSORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_ID = #{adminUser.atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ADMIN_SECRET_KEY_ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ADMIN_SECRET_KEY_ID, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_SID, UPDATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_SID, REMARK,
from AUTHEN_ADMIN_SECRET_KEY where ADMIN_SECRET_KEY_ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
